body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install pkgconf@1.5.4
==> Fetching http://distfiles.alpinelinux.org/distfiles/pkgconf-1.5.4.tar.xz

curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 404 Not Found
==> Fetching from http://distfiles.alpinelinux.org/distfiles/pkgconf-1.5.4.tar.xz failed.
```
title: URL for pkgconf@1.5.4 is broken
